email_subject: What's facing FBI's new CIO? (Tech Update)
email_body: In the twilight of his career, an IT veteran takes on the formidable task of transforming the FBI's antiquated technology infrastructure. He's being sworn in today. Read my interview with Darwin John at http://clickthru.online.com/Click?q=4e-0Y95InZASFVHi6JIKlsTn8N_Jj9R.
